frameDefinitions: A recordable sequence of events is associated with a given Topic.

An Item is located at the top end of a scale of importance or social rank (or some other Attribute) in comparison to other members of a Contrast_set (usually, implicit) that is otherwise similar in kind to the Item.
A Topical_entity has properties which are affected by the existence and association of an Entity.
An Entity is presented as having been seen or experienced by a (typically generic and backgrounded)
A Total has a Part, either  as a member of an aggregate or as  a constituent part of a simple entity.
An Owner has (or lacks) a Possession. ''
frameExamples: And that is where the <t>history</t> of art begins.
The <t>main</t> problem is that the administration has not yet clarified 'Regime change.' INI
By the 1920s a characteristic book <t>had</t> black and white photographic illustrations only .
Susanna Fulton's work is <t>new</t> to me.
The river's part of my  manor, but of course it also <t>belongs</t> to the River Police.
listRoleDefinitions: The <fen>Topic</fen> is the subject about which the history is given.
When the events concerning the <fen>Topic</fen> occured.
An <fen>Item</fen> is the foremost thing in the <fen>Contrast_set</fen>.
This role identifies the domain (usually temporally or spatially defined) within which the <fen>Item</fen> is primary among its kind.
The <fen>Contrast_set</fen> is a group of entities similar to the <fen>Item</fen> out of which the <fen>Item</fen> is the most preeminent.
Some entity, abstract or concrete, which is stated to exist and be associated with the <fen>Topical_entity</fen>.
The entity under discussion, whose states and properties are impacted by its association with the <fen>Entity</fen>.
The time at which the <fen>Entity</fen> exists and is associated with the <fen>Topical_entity</fen>
The place where the <fen>Entity</fen> is associated with the <fen>Topical_entity</fen>.
A concrete thing or abstract phenomenon or fact that is assessed in terms of how well recognizable it is to a <fen>Cognizer</fen>.
The (typically non-specific and backgrounded) sentient being for whom the <fen>Entity</fen> possesses a specified level of recognizability.
The deviation of the actual level of recognizability of the <fen>Entity</fen> from the level specified by the target.
A complex entity, either an aggregate or a unit, of which a <fen>Part</fen>,  a constituent or a component, is specified.
A component or constituent that is specified to form part of the <fen>Total</fen>.
The <fen>Time</fen> at which the <fen>Total</fen> includes the <fen>Part</fen>.
The location at which the <fen>Total</fen> includes the <fen>Part</fen>.
The entity that owns a posession.

The thing which is owned by the Owner.
Ex.:  I <t>have</t> <fex name='Possession'>twenty bucks</fex>.
(This does not include bodyparts or medical conditions, but does include intellectual property, etc.)
This role indicates the <fen>Time</fen> interval during which the <fen>Owner</fen> has a possession.
listRoleExamples: The role of the Byzantine Empire in <fex>European</fex> history is not understood by all.
The foremost band <fex>in the world of the 1960's</fex> was clearly the Beatles.
Our discussion has raised a number of issues, foremost <fex>among them</fex> time.
He gave <fex>an address</fex> quite familiar to the chauffeur.
The information used to illustrate the concept is familiar <fex>to the reader</fex>.
He gave an address <fex>quite</fex> familiar to the chauffeur.
The larger album includes <fex>designs for his house at Whitehall</fex>.
<fex>Last year</fex> the recognized departments included the Russian and East European Institute, and the Office of International Programs.
<fex>In California</fex>, the category excludes minors and the mentally ill.

the National Museum of Welsh Life
